normalised: E V Charging Getting a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: Bangalore's traffic giving you range anxiety? Well, fret no more! The EV charging scene in India is heating up faster than Amma's biryani on Onam.
normalised: Bangalore's traffic giving you range anxiety? Well, fret no more! The E V charging scene in India is heating up faster than Amma's biryani on Onam.

unnormalised: IIT-Madras just unveiled a new fast-charging tech that promises to juice up your electric rickshaw in under 30 minutes. That's faster than waiting for your chai at a roadside tapri!
normalised: I I T-Madras just unveiled a new fast-charging tech that promises to juice up your electric rickshaw in under thirty minutes. That's faster than waiting for your chai at a roadside tapri!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Reliance is planning to roll out charging stations along the Mumbai-Pune expressway, offering competitive rates of around Rs. 15 per unit. Imagine cruising without worrying about getting stranded near Lonavala!
normalised: Meanwhile, Reliance is planning to roll out charging stations along the Mumbai-Pune expressway, offering competitive rates of around rupee fifteen per unit. Imagine cruising without worrying about getting stranded near Lonavala!

unnormalised: Ola Electric is also jumping into the fray, aiming to install chargers every 50 km on major highways. Think of it as your EV pilgrimage, complete with readily available "prasad" (electricity!).
normalised: Ola Electric is also jumping into the fray, aiming to install chargers every fifty kilometer on major highways. Think of it as your E V pilgrimage, complete with readily available "prasad" (electricity!).

unnormalised: Tata Power's already got a solid network, but these new players mean more options and hopefully, shorter queues. So, ditch the petrol blues and embrace the electric future. Your wallet and the planet will thank you!
normalised: Tata Power's already got a solid network, but these new players mean more options and hopefully, shorter queues. So, ditch the petrol blues and embrace the electric future. Your wallet and the planet will thank you!
